txt.en: 'The keep is ours, [placeholder]. Leave or die'
'I've survived far greater odds than this!'
As you enter Bekâr-mazal, you spot a large Orc on the walkway above...
'I shall make quick work of you!'
'You are awfully brave to face us!'
'The cacophony of sounds reverberating through the halls signal Orcs in greater numbers than originally suspected'
Instance: Reclamation of the Steel Keep
'These walls are lined with knowledge passed down through the ages, and they are sure to be heavily guarded'
'The Orcs covet not only great knowledge, but immense wealth as well'
'You dare try your hand at battle with Zánmog, fool?'
'You must think I'm dumber than I look'
'The spoils of the Steel Keep are ours!'
